参考

q-e code


物理相关

Pauil矩阵

@曹老师.数理史上的绝妙证明：电子自旋是相对论性质——贤说八道

二分量波函数

磁矩

QE的自旋密度就来自自旋磁矩的计算公式
途中$\mu$为电子质量$m$


代码模块

lsda_mod

File:PW/src/pwcom.f90
控制lsda计算的变量

  LOGICAL :: &
       lsda !只有nspin=2时, lsda  == T, 其他不考虑自旋和nonclinear情况 lsda == F
  REAL(DP) :: &
       magtot,                       &! total magnetization
       absmag,                       &! total absolute magnetization
       starting_magnetization(ntypx)  ! the magnetization used to start with
  INTEGER :: &
       nspin,           &! number of spin polarization: 2 if lsda, 1 other
       !无自旋 nspin=0, lsda nspin=2, nonclinear nspin=4
       !读入的nspin会被实际情况nospin/lsda/nonclinear 替换掉
       current_spin,    &! spin of the current kpoint,
       !仅在lsda时current=1,2其他情况current_spin==1
       isk(npk)          ! for each k-point: 1=spin up, 2=spin down
       !经常这样使用 IF ( lsda ) current_spin = isk(ik)

波函数

波函数变量

File:Modules/wavefunctions.f90

     COMPLEX(DP), ALLOCATABLE, TARGET :: &
       evc(:,:)     ! wavefunctions in the PW basis set
                    ! noncolinear case: first index
                    ! is a combined PW + spin index
     !
     COMPLEX(DP) , ALLOCATABLE, TARGET :: &
       psic(:), &      ! additional memory for FFT
       psic_nc(:,:)    ! as above for the noncolinear case
     !

单k点波函数evc File:PW/src/allocate_wfc.f90

!nc时npol=2,其他npol=1
ALLOCATE( evc( npwx*npol, nbnd ) )

提取用单k点单band波函数 File:PW/src/allocate_fft.f90

ALLOCATE (psic( dfftp%nnr))
IF (noncolin) ALLOCATE (psic_nc( dfftp%nnr, npol))

使用

DO j = 1, npw
   psic(dffts%nl(igk_k(j,ik))) = evc(j,ibnd)
ENDDO

DO ig = 1, npw
   psic_nc(dffts%nl(igk_k(ig,ik)),1)=evc(ig     ,ibnd)
   psic_nc(dffts%nl(igk_k(ig,ik)),2)=evc(ig+npwx,ibnd)
END DO

从buffer中读取波函数,nwordwfc会根据nspin取具体的数值
nwordwfc(nspin=1)==nwordwfc(nspin=2)==0.5*nwordwfc(nspin=4)

IF( nks > 1 ) &
   CALL get_buffer ( evc, nwordwfc, itdksf, ik )

k点和band占据情况

仅在lsda情况下，k点数量会加倍 nks(nospin)=nks(nonclinear)=0.5*nks(lsda)

wg(ibnd,ik)占据情况,以两个电子单k点为例

  • nspin=1,wg=2,0,0,0 #每个态是简并的,最多占据两个电子
  • nspin=2/lsda,wg(ik=1)=1,0,0,0; wg(ik=2)=1,0,0,0 #加倍k点,每个k点代表一个自旋
  • nspin=4/nonclinear,wg=1,1,0,0 #不加倍k点,每个band是一种特殊的自旋状态,一个态上只有一个电子

wg(ibnd,ik)占据情况,以一个电子单k点为例

  • nspin=1,wg=1,0,0,0 #每个态是简并的,最多占据两个电子
  • nspin=2/lsda,wg(ik=1)=0.5,0,0,0; wg(ik=2)=0.5,0,0,0 #加倍k点,每个k点代表一个自旋
  • nspin=4/nonclinear,wg=1,0,0,0 #不加倍k点,每个band是一种特殊的自旋状态,一个态上只有一个电子

noncoline时的KS方程

程序中的势能项处理:
在势能vrs(:,1)中保留$\delta^{\sigma,\sigma’}$的项,在vrs(:,2:4)中保存$\sigma_{x,y,z}$的系数$-\mu_B \, B_{tot} = -\mu_B ( B_{xc} + B_{external})$, 即

  • $-\mu_B \, B_{tot}(x)=vrs(2)$
  • $-\mu_B \, B_{tot}(y)=vrs(3)$
  • $-\mu_B \, B_{tot}(z)=vrs(4)$

在PW/src/v_of+rho.f90中的v_xc计算 $-\mu_B B_{xc,\alpha}=\mu_B \frac{\partial E_{xc} }{\partial m_\alpha} = \mu_B \frac{\partial E_{xc} }{\partial \left | m \right | } \frac{m_\alpha}{\left | m \right | }$

!...
amag = SQRT( rho%of_r(ir,2)**2 + rho%of_r(ir,3)**2 + rho%of_r(ir,4)**2 )
!...
CALL xc_spin( arhox, zeta, ex, ec, vx(1), vx(2), vc(1), vc(2) )
           !== arhox 总电荷密度
           !== zeta == +1
           !== xc_spin (rho, zeta, ex, ec, vxup, vxdw, vcup, vcdw)
           !== rho = rhoup(r)+rhodw(r)
           !== zeta=(rhoup(r)-rhodw(r))/rho
           vs = 0.5D0*( vx(1) + vc(1) - vx(2) - vc(2) )
           !
           v(ir,1) = e2*( 0.5D0*( vx(1) + vc(1) + vx(2) + vc(2 ) ) )
           !V_XC
           !
           IF ( amag > vanishing_mag ) THEN
              !
              DO ipol = 2, 4
                 !
                 v(ir,ipol) = e2 * vs * rho%of_r(ir,ipol) / amag
                 ! \partial E_xc / \partial m_\alpha = - B_xc
                 !
                 vtxc = vtxc + v(ir,ipol) * rho%of_r(ir,ipol)
                 !
              END DO
              !
           END IF

在PW/src/add_bfield.f90中计算$-\mu_B B_{external}$

        DO ipol = 1,3
           DO ir =1,dfftp%nnr
              v(ir,ipol+1) = v(ir,ipol+1)-bfield(ipol)
           END DO
        END DO

在PW/src/vloc_psi.f90中的vloc_psi_nc计算$V_{tot}\,\psi$

DO j=1, dffts%nnr
 !这里的v就是vrs
   sup = psic_nc(j,1) * (v(j,1)+v(j,4)) + &
         psic_nc(j,2) * (v(j,2)-(0.d0,1.d0)*v(j,3))
   sdwn = psic_nc(j,2) * (v(j,1)-v(j,4)) + &
          psic_nc(j,1) * (v(j,2)+(0.d0,1.d0)*v(j,3))
   psic_nc(j,1)=sup
   psic_nc(j,2)=sdwn
ENDDO

lsda时的KS方程

程序中的势能项处理:
因为$\sigma_{z}$的数值特点
在势能vrs(:,1)中保留$\delta^{\sigma,\sigma’}$的项,与$\sigma_{z}$系数
在势能vrs(:,2)中保留$\delta^{\sigma,\sigma’}$的项,与$\sigma_{z}$系数的相反数

        DO ir =1,dfftp%nnr
           v(ir,1) = v(ir,1)-bfield(ipol)
           v(ir,2) = v(ir,2)+bfield(ipol)
        END DO

因此在计算$V\,\psi$时,只要将该k点对应的vrs(:,current_spin)乘到波函数上就行了,
如在PW/src/h_psi.f90中调用的那样

CALL vloc_psi_k ( lda, n, m, psi, vrs(1,current_spin), hpsi )

电荷密度

File:PW/src/scf_mod.f90

   allocate ( rho%of_r( dfftp%nnr, nspin) )
   allocate ( rho%of_g( ngm, nspin ) )

电荷密度的计算 File:PW/src/sum_band.f90

  • nspin=1,rho%of_r( dfftp%nnr, 1)为总电荷密度
  • nspin=2,rho%of_r( dfftp%nnr, 1:2)分别为自旋上下电荷密度,但是在sum_band最后会变换(up,down)->(up+down,up-down) 
    psic(dffts%nl(igk_k(j,ik))) = evc(j,ibnd)
CALL get_rho(rho%kin_r(:,current_spin), dffts%nnr, w1, psic)
! ... if LSDA rho%of_r and rho%of_g are converted from (up,dw) to
! ... (up+dw,up-dw) format.
!
IF ( nspin == 2 ) CALL rhoz_or_updw( rho, 'r_and_g', '->rhoz' )
  • nspin=4,rho%of_r( dfftp%nnr, 1)为总电荷密度, rho%of_r( dfftp%nnr, 2:4)为磁密度 
    psic_nc(dffts%nl(igk_k(ig,ik)),1)=evc(ig     ,ibnd)
psic_nc(dffts%nl(igk_k(ig,ik)),2)=evc(ig+npwx,ibnd)
DO ipol=1,npol
 CALL get_rho(rho%of_r(:,1), dffts%nnr, w1, psic_nc(:,ipol))
END DO
IF (domag) THEN!===== 计算三个方向的磁性
 CALL get_rho_domag(rho%of_r(:,:), dffts%nnr, w1, psic_nc(:,:))
ELSE
 rho%of_r(:,2:4)=0.0_DP
END IF
  • 综上:总电荷密度=rho%of_r(:,1)

noncollinear的磁密度

sum_band_k()中的get_rho_domag就是使用此公式进行计算,公式来自物理部分的推导 

        DO ir = 1, nrxxs_loc
           !
           rho_loc(ir,2) = rho_loc(ir,2) + w1_loc*2.D0* &
                          (DBLE(psic_loc(ir,1))* DBLE(psic_loc(ir,2)) + &
                          AIMAG(psic_loc(ir,1))*AIMAG(psic_loc(ir,2)))
          !这里就是psi^*(up)psi(down)+psi^*(down)psi(up)=2*Re(psi^*(up)psi(down))
          ! =2*(REAL(psi(up))*REAL(psi(up) + IMAG(psi(up))*IMAG(psi(down))
 
           rho_loc(ir,3) = rho_loc(ir,3) + w1_loc*2.D0* &
                          (DBLE(psic_loc(ir,1))*AIMAG(psic_loc(ir,2)) - &
                           DBLE(psic_loc(ir,2))*AIMAG(psic_loc(ir,1)))
         !== 是公式的my

           rho_loc(ir,4) = rho_loc(ir,4) + w1_loc* &
                          (DBLE(psic_loc(ir,1))**2+AIMAG(psic_loc(ir,1))**2 &
                          -DBLE(psic_loc(ir,2))**2-AIMAG(psic_loc(ir,2))**2)
         !=== 是公式的mz
           !
        END DO

lsda密度

lsda时rho%of_r( dfftp%nnr, 2)存着自旋密度之差

  IF ( nspin == 2 ) CALL rhoz_or_updw( rho, 'r_and_g', '->rhoz' )

noncollin_module

File:Modules/noncol.f90

  INTEGER :: &
      npol,               & !  number of coordinates of wfc
      report,             & !  print the local quantities (magnet. and rho)
                            !  every #report iterations
      nspin_lsda = 1,     & !  =1 when nspin=1,4 =2 when nspin=2 
      nspin_mag = 1,      & !  =1 when nspin=1,4 (domag=.false.), =2 when
                            !   nspin=2, =4 nspin=4 (domag=.true.)
      nspin_gga = 1,      & !  =1 when nspin=1,4 (domag=.false.)   
                            !  =2 when nspin=2,4 (domag=.true.) (needed with gga)
      i_cons = 0            !  indicator for constrained local quantities
                            !与输入参数constrained_magnetization对应
  !
  INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: &
  !                         !  when spherical (non-overlapping) integration
      pointlist(:)          !  regions are defined around atoms this index
                            !  say for each point in the fft grid to which 
                            !  atom it is assigned (0 if no atom is selected)
  !
  LOGICAL :: &
      noncolin, &           !  true if noncollinear magnetism is allowed
      lsign=.FALSE.         !  if true use the sign feature to calculate
                            !  rhoup and rhodw
  !
  REAL (DP) :: &
      angle1(ntypx),       &!  Define the polar coordinates of the starting
      angle2(ntypx),       &!  magnetization's direction for each atom
      mcons(3,ntypx)=0.d0, &!  constrained values for local variables


      magtot_nc(3),        &!  total magnetization
      bfield(3)=0.d0,      &!  magnetic field used in some cases
      vtcon,               &!  contribution of the constraining fields to
                            !  the total energy
      r_m(ntypx) = 0.0d0,  &!  Radius for local integrations for each type
      lambda                !  prefactor in the penalty functional 
                            !  for constraints
  !
  REAL (DP), ALLOCATABLE :: &
      factlist(:),         &! weight factors for local integrations
      r_loc(:),            &! local integrated charge 
      m_loc(:,:)            ! local integrated magnetization

  REAL(DP) ::     &
     ux(3)                 ! versor for deciding signs in gga

i_cons的设置, constrained_magnetization=

  • none, i_cons = 0
  • atomic, i_cons = 1
  • atomic direction, i_cons = 2
  • total, i_cons=3
  • total direction, i_cons=6
  • B_field != 0, i_cons=4

对应的受限制的固定的磁化mcons也因constrained_magnetization有相关的设置,如

mcons(1,nt) = starting_magnetization(nt)
!...
mcons(1,nt) = starting_magnetization(nt) * sin( theta ) * cos( phi )
mcons(2,nt) = starting_magnetization(nt) * sin( theta ) * sin( phi )
mcons(3,nt) = starting_magnetization(nt) * cos( theta

spin_orb 模块

File:PW/src/pwcom.f90

MODULE spin_orb

  USE kinds, ONLY: DP
  USE parameters, ONLY : lmaxx

  SAVE

  LOGICAL :: &
      lspinorb,            &  ! if .TRUE. this is a spin-orbit calculation
      lforcet,             &  ! if .TRUE. apply Force Theorem to calculate MAE 
      starting_spin_angle, &  ! if .TRUE. the initial wavefunctions are 
                              ! spin-angle functions. 
      domag                   ! if .TRUE. magnetization is computed


  COMPLEX (DP) :: rot_ylm(2*lmaxx+1,2*lmaxx+1)  ! transform real
                         ! spherical harmonics into complex ones
  COMPLEX (DP), ALLOCATABLE :: fcoef(:,:,:,:,:) ! function needed to
                         ! account for spinors.
END MODULE spin_orb

在PW/src/setup.f90中设置domag

  IF ( noncolin ) THEN
  !...
     IF ( lspinorb ) THEN
        domag = ANY ( ABS( starting_magnetization(1:ntyp) ) > 1.D-6 )
     ELSE
        domag = .TRUE.
     END IF
  !...
  ENDIF

domag决定sum_band_k中是否要计算$m_{x,y,z}$,计算公式见上noncolinear磁密度

   IF (domag) THEN
      CALL get_rho_domag(rho%of_r(:,:), dffts%nnr, w1, psic_nc(:,:))
   ELSE
      rho%of_r(:,2:4)=0.0_DP
   END IF

domag还决定是否根据$m_{x,y,z}$计算相应的交换关联磁势
File:PW/src/v_of_rho.f90

CALL xc_spin( arhox, zeta, ex, ec, vx(1), vx(2), vc(1), vc(2) )
           !
           vs = 0.5D0*( vx(1) + vc(1) - vx(2) - vc(2) )
           !
           v(ir,1) = e2*( 0.5D0*( vx(1) + vc(1) + vx(2) + vc(2 ) ) )
           !
           IF ( amag > vanishing_mag ) THEN
              !
              DO ipol = 2, 4
                 !
                 v(ir,ipol) = e2 * vs * rho%of_r(ir,ipol) / amag
                 !
                 vtxc = vtxc + v(ir,ipol) * rho%of_r(ir,ipol)
                 !
              END DO
              !
           END IF
           !
           etxc = etxc + e2*( ex + ec ) * rhox
           vtxc = vtxc + v(ir,1) * rho%of_r(ir,1)
